author: cnbc.com
title: Redwood Asset Management Inc. Announces March Distributions
text:
TORONTO, March 20, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Redwood Asset Management Inc. is pleased to announce the following distributions for the month of March 2018. The ex-distribution date is March 28, 2018.
Open-End Funds Ticker Symbol Distribution per share/unit Record Date Payable Date Distribution Frequency Redwood Canadian Preferred Share Fund – ETF Units RPS $ 0.0950 03/29/2018 04/06/2018 Monthly Redwood Core Income Equity Fund – ETF Series RDE $ 0.0690 03/29/2018 04/06/2018 Monthly Redwood U.S. Preferred Share Fund – ETF Units RPU $ 0.0940 03/29/2018 04/06/2018 Monthly Redwood U.S. Preferred Share Fund Non-Currency Hedged – ETF Units 2 RPU.B / RPU.U $ 0.0940 03/29/2018 04/06/2018 Monthly Redwood Emerging Markets Dividend Fund – ETF Units REM $ 0.0403 03/29/2018 04/06/2018 Monthly Redwood Energy Credit Fund – ETF Units PCF $ 0.0350 03/29/2018 04/06/2018 Monthly Redwood Energy Credit Fund – Non-Currency Hedged USD Option - ETF Units PCF.U US$ 0.0359 03/29/2018 04/06/2018 Monthly

per unit Record Date Payable Date Distribution Frequency Canadian Investment Grade Preferred Share Fund (P2L) – Class T RIGP.UN $ 0.1146 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly Canadian Investment Grade Preferred Share Fund (P2L) – Class A unlisted $ 0.1146 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly June 2021 Investment Grade Bond Pool – Class T RBP.UN $ 0.0887 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Quarterly June 2021 Investment Grade Bond Pool – Class A unlisted $ 0.0775 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Quarterly Redwood Energy Income Fund AOG.UN $ 0.01125 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly Redwood Advantage Monthly Income Fund AV.UN $ 0.0350 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly Redwood Monthly Income Fund VIP.UN $ 0.0350 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly Redwood Floating Rate Bond Fund - Class A IFL.UN $ 0.0500 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly Redwood Floating Rate Bond Fund – Class U unlisted US$ 0.0500 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly Redwood Floating Rate Income Fund – Class A ISL.UN $ 0.0417 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly Redwood Floating Rate Income Fund - Class U ISL.U US$ 0.0417 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Monthly Australian Banc Income Fund – Class A AUI.UN $0.1875 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Quarterly Australian Banc Income Fund – Class F unlisted $0.1875 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Quarterly Redwood Global Financials Income Fund – Class A NAF.UN $0.3125 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Quarterly Redwood Global Financials Income Fund – Class F unlisted $0.3125 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Quarterly Redwood Global Infrastructure Income Fund MQI.UN $0.1500 03/29/2018 04/13/2018 Quarterly (1) Dividend is designated as an “eligible” Canadian dividend for purposes of the Income Tax Act (Canada) and any similar provincial and territorial legislation.
(2) Redwood U.S. Preferred Share Fund Non-Currency Hedged – ETF Units have both a CAD and USD purchase option. Distribution per unit is declared in CAD, however, the USD purchase option (RPU.U) distribution will be made in the USD equivalent. Conversion into USD will use the end-of-day foreign exchange rate prevailing on the ex-distribution date.
About Redwood Asset Management Inc.
Redwood Asset Management is a Toronto-based investment fund manager, focused on delivering unique investment solutions managed by boutique global investment managers to Canadian investors. Redwood Asset Management is a wholly owned subsidiary of Purpose Investments Inc., which has over $4.9 billion in assets under management. More information about Redwood's product offerings is available at www.redwoodasset.com .
